sentences.en: a fierce rivalry for world supremacy
sentences.cn: 夺取世界霸权的激烈竞争

sentences.en: A tumult of feelings inside her fought for supremacy.
But Lincoln would not listen to such proposals unless the supremacy of the Union was maintained.
sentences.cn: 但是林肯不愿听取这样的提议,除非维持联邦至高无上的地位.

sentences.en: By the end of the war, the prince had established total supremacy over all his rivals.
sentences.cn: 战争结束时, 王子已确立了凌驾于所有对手之上的绝对优势.

sentences.en: Coal gave the region industrial supremacy.
sentences.cn: 煤炭给这个地区带来了工业上的优势.

sentences.en: Freedom means the supremacy of human rights everywhere.
sentences.cn: 自由是指处处以人权为至上.

sentences.en: Generally, over the period, the doctrines of intellectual reactionaries enjoyed the supremacy.
sentences.cn: 一般来说, 在这个时期, 有智识的反动保守分子的教义一直享有主导地位.

sentences.en: Japan’s unchallenged supremacy in the field of electronics
sentences.cn: 日本在电子领域无人挑战的领先地位

sentences.en: No one could challenge her supremacy in gymnastics.
sentences.cn: 她是最优秀的体操运动员,无人能胜过她.

sentences.en: One in a position of supremacy or domination over others.
sentences.cn: 最高统治者具有至高无上的权威或支配他人的人.

sentences.en: Operating principle: the supremacy of credibility, quality assurance, excellence and common development.
sentences.cn: 经营宗旨: 信誉至上 、 品质保证 、 精益求精、共同发展.

sentences.en: the battle for supremacy in the region
The city is a residue of Britain's era of commercial and industrial supremacy.
sentences.cn: 伦敦商业区是英国工商业全盛时期的残余.

sentences.en: The conservative old guard had re-established its political supremacy.
sentences.cn: 守旧的保守派已经重新掌控了政治大权。

sentences.en: The supremacy obligations is the supremacy of mutual help, nothing more.
sentences.cn: 人伦至上只不过就是互相帮助至上.

sentences.en: The tragedy also mirrors the sense of supremacy in the writer's mind.
sentences.cn: 同时也反映了冯梦龙“情教思想 ” 的双重性,以及存在于作家脑海中的男权意识.

words.tran_cn: 最高的；至高的；最重要的
苏帕摩（哥伦比亚一种咖啡豆）；最高领导人
霸权；至高无上；主权；最高地位

phrases.tran_cn: 白人至上；白人至上主义

trans.tran_cn: 至高无上，最高权力，最高地位，霸权
trans.tran_en: the position in which you are more powerful or advanced than anyone else
